tool_description: Simply provide a Twitter username, and our API will return the direct image URL of the user's profile picture. Whether you're building a social media dashboard, enhancing user profiles, or personalizing content, our API streamlines the process, making it quick and easy to integrate real-time Twitter profile pictures into your application or website.
name: Twitter Avatar API
title: Twitter Avatar API

api_list.name: Get Twitter Avatar
api_list.description: Get the direct image URL of the user's profile picture
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-avatar-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
